title: Travel Clinic
text: We run a travel clinic bitch

title: Needle Exchange
text: If you want a new needle just bring us your old needle and then you can have a new needle for free!

title: Emergency Contraceptives
text: If your primary form of contraception failed, turn up and get the EC for free!

title: Medicine Use Reviews
text: Not sure if your medicines are working anymore? Drop in and we get £28!

title: New Medicines Service
text: Not sure how to take your new medicines? Drop in and we get £18!

title: Private prescriptions
text: Y'know how Frost's makes loads of money selling drugs online? So do we!

title: STI tests
text: We get paid to do these tests for you so you know if you're contagious
